```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#Convert hhinc from factor to numeric
NY$hhinc <- as.numeric(as.character(NY$hhinc))
#Remove birth place 98 (98 = not reported)
#Convert birth place from factor to numeric
NY$hhbirth <- as.numeric(as.character(NY$hhbirth))
NY$dadbirth <- as.numeric(as.character(NY$dadbirth))
NY$mombirth <- as.numeric(as.character(NY$mombirth))
#Remove people with birth place 98
NY<-NY %>% filter((`hhbirth` <= 97.5))
NY<-NY %>% filter((`dadbirth` <= 97.5))
NY<-NY %>% filter((`mombirth` <= 97.5))
```

```{r}
#PLOT CONCENTRATION OF IMMIGRANTS BY BOROUGH AND YEAR
#Subset first and second generation and American
gen_0 <- NY %>% filter((`gen` == 0))
gen_1 <- NY %>% filter((`gen` == 1))
gen_2 <- NY %>% filter((`gen` == 2))

#Plot Immigrant Population by Borough per Year
ggplot(gen_0,aes(as.factor(gen_0$year),fill=as.factor(gen_0$borough)))+
  geom_bar(position="fill") + labs(title = "Immigrant Population by Borough per Year", subtitle = "Non-Immigrants", x = "Year", y = "Count") + scale_fill_discrete(name = "Borough", labels = c("Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Manhattan", "Queens", "Staten Island")) + scale_x_discrete(labels=c("91" = "1991", "93" = "1993", "96" = "1996", "99" = "1999")) 

ggplot(gen_1,aes(as.factor(gen_1$year),fill=as.factor(gen_1$borough)))+
  geom_bar(position="fill") + labs(title = "Immigrant Population by Borough per Year", subtitle = "First Generation Immigrants", x = "Year", y = "Count") + scale_fill_discrete(name = "Borough", labels = c("Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Manhattan", "Queens", "Staten Island")) + scale_x_discrete(labels=c("91" = "1991", "93" = "1993", "96" = "1996", "99" = "1999")) 

ggplot(gen_2,aes(as.factor(gen_2$year),fill=as.factor(gen_2$borough)))+
  geom_bar(position="fill") + labs(title = "Immigrant Population by Borough per Year", subtitle = "Second Generation Immigrants", x = "Year", y = "Count") + scale_fill_discrete(name = "Borough", labels = c("Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Manhattan", "Queens", "Staten Island")) + scale_x_discrete(labels=c("91" = "1991", "93" = "1993", "96" = "1996", "99" = "1999")) 
```

```{r}
#HHINC - USE
#Remove values equal to 999998 (999998 = NOT REPORTED)
NY$hhinc <- as.character(NY$hhinc)
subset_hhinc<-NY[ which( ! NY$hhinc %in% "999998") , ]
NY$hhinc <- as.numeric(as.character(NY$hhinc))
subset_hhinc$hhinc <- as.numeric(as.character(subset_hhinc$hhinc))
#Create subset for mean hhinc by year and gen
mean_hhinc<-aggregate(subset_hhinc[, 58], list(subset_hhinc$year, subset_hhinc$gen), mean)
colnames(mean_hhinc)[1] <- "Year"
colnames(mean_hhinc)[2] <- "Generation"

#PLOT HHINC BY YEAR
ggplot(mean_hhinc, aes(x=Year, y=x, group=Generation, colour=Generation)) +
    geom_line() + geom_point() + labs(title = "Mean Householder Income by Year", x = "Year", y = "Income") +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=c("91" = "1991", "93" = "1993", "96" = "1996", "99" = "1999")) 
```

```{r}
hhinc_1991 <- subset_hhinc %>% filter((`year` == 91))
```
